app_ids.title: Application IDs
app_ids.description: Provide a list of application ids separated by comma.

from_date.title: From Date
from_date.description: Provide the start date in format YYYY-MM-DD.

to_date.title: To Date
to_date.description: Provide the end date in format YYYY-MM-DD.

desired_reports.title: Desired Reports
desired_reports.description: Provide a list of reports you want to retrieve separated by comma.
